title: Brand Partnership Manager - Beauty & Healthcare - Munich
description:
Responsibilities
Our Brand Partnership Team is responsible for driving business, helping advertisers meet their branding goals, and building long term relationships with brands in the beauty industry across the DACH region. Our innovative advertising products are high-impact and engaging, we create a native experience for our users and develop deep connections with our brands.

Responsibilities
- Own client relationships with major beauty & healthcare companies, increase product adoption and develop scaled solutions
- Be instrumental in the external narrative of TikTok in the market
- Collaborate cross functionally to ensure improvement for product, process and client relationships
- Analyse campaign performance to constantly give feedback on optimised media solutions

Qualifications
Minimum Qualifications
- 5+ years of experience in media sales, digital marketing, brand advertising, and/or online advertising experience
- Fully fluent and written English & German language communication skills are mandatory in order to be able to communicate with local clients
- Demonstrated track record of achieving and exceeding revenue goals in a Media Sales/Partnerships role
- Demonstrated knowledge and understanding of digital marketing funnel - specifically performance marketing
- Good knowledge of the beauty or healthcare industry landscape
- Excellent verbal and written German and English language skills

Preferred Qualifications
- Self-starter, fast learner with a start-up spirit
- Creative, outside-the-box thinker and strategist
- Excellent communication and presentation skills
- Ability to win the support of senior stakeholders

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.​

title: Communications Manager, E-Commerce, Germany
description:
Responsibilities
About the Team
This role sits within our Global Communications team and will work closely with the local TikTok Shop Operations, Business and Product teams in Germany as well as cross-functional legal, policy teams. This role will be critical in supporting TikTok Shop's expansion into Germany with core responsibilities including building local narratives, devising communications strategies and advising business and product teams on a range of topics including product positioning, market trends and external issues.

Responsibilities
- Lead TikTok Shop communications efforts in Germany, and be the first point of contact for local TikTok Shop operations and business teams
- Craft clear, compelling narratives that advance TikTok Shop's business goals and resonate with sellers, creators, and buyers.
- Build strong relationships with top-tier nationals and trade press, proactively securing coverage, managing inquiries, and managing sensitive news cycles and issues as they arise.
- In partnership with market comms leads in Germany, handle inbound press inquiries and engage with media on a range of issues.
- Review TikTok Shop externally facing content in German including seller communications, presentations, seasonal promotions, logistics updates and more for accuracy and reputational risks.
- Train and coach local market executives and subject-matter experts, equipping them with concise messaging for interviews and in-person events. Staff interviews and events on site.
- Work cross-functionally with regional and global communications teams based on regional and market needs to drive clear narratives about our business product, partnerships and vision.
- Serve as the primary Communications point of contact for local cross functional partners (marketing, operations, policy, legal, creator partnerships), ensuring message alignment and advising on market trends, potential risks, and opportunities specific to the German market.

Qualifications
Minimum Qualifications
- Fluent in German and English (speaking and writing)
- BA/BS degree or equivalent experience required
- 7+ years of experience in relevant field
- Proven understanding of the German media landscape
- Deep understanding of public opinions and media sentiment about commerce
- An excellent communicator (both written and verbal) who can successfully build relationships with key stakeholders both internally and externally
- A highly resilient team player who can lead projects and strong project management skills.

Preferred Qualifications
- Experience working in social media, Internet and technology companies
- Experience working in cross-border, multi-cultural environment is preferred
- Ability to cope well and gain trust with internal stakeholders, proven track record of working in a dynamic and large organization is preferred
- Ability to multitask efficiently under pressure and ambiguity, with self-starting and motivated attitudes in a cross-cultural and fast-paced environment
- Understanding of the e-commerce + marketplace landscape as well as knowledge and experience of e-commerce products is preferred.

About TikTok
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and we also have offices in New York City, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.​


Why Join Us
Inspiring creativity is at the core of TikTok's mission. Our innovative product is built to help people authentically express themselves, discover and connect – and our global, diverse teams make that possible. Together, we create value for our communities, inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we work towards every day.​
We strive to do great things with great people. We lead with curiosity, humility, and a desire to make impact in a rapidly growing tech company. Every challenge is an opportunity to learn and innovate as one team. We're resilient and embrace challenges as they come. By constantly iterating and fostering an "Always Day 1" mindset, we achieve meaningful breakthroughs for ourselves, our company, and our users. When we create and grow together, the possibilities are limitless. Join us.​
​
Diversity & Inclusion​
TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.​
Show more

title: Social Media Manager W/M/D
description:
Welcome to Warner Bros. Discovery… the stuff dreams are made of.

Who We Are…

When we say, “the stuff dreams are made of,” we’re not just referring to the world of wizards, dragons and superheroes, or even to the wonders of Planet Earth. Behind WBD’s vast portfolio of iconic content and beloved brands, are the storytellers bringing our characters to life, the creators bringing them to your living rooms and the dreamers creating what’s next…

From brilliant creatives, to technology trailblazers, across the globe, WBD offers career defining opportunities, thoughtfully curated benefits, and the tools to explore and grow into your best selves. Here you are supported, here you are celebrated, here you can thrive.

Your New Role

The Social Media team is on a mission to drive connection with our passionate audiences and brand defining moments that shake you, move you, and stay with you.

The team is part of the Brand and Content Marketing team in EMEA, and you will collaborate closely within the team to grow brand and content love across local social channels. You will be the Social Media Manager for Germany and our leading expert in the areas of: Original Productions (Germany), German social audiences, Local content creators & events. You will also take a role in driving moments of brand love across EMEA.

Your mission is to launch HBO Max in Germany, build a strong, engaged follower base, and drive brand awareness and love. As German social lead, you will own, create and implement the local brand strategy and work towards the perfect split between local content and global IPs represented in our communities.

As Manager of Local Productions (DE), you lead the strategy, creative execution, and campaign rollouts to drive maximum social impact for HBO Max' local content. With a sharp eye for local trends and audience insights, you craft distinct, high-performing campaigns in close collaboration with regional stakeholders, activating industry tastemakers on social and curating content creators.

A

s Social Manager in Germany, you lead the launch and daily management of local social handles, creating organic and editorial content that reflects and celebrates community diversity. You stay plugged into local trends, collaborate with partners on events and campaigns, and drive visibility and performance. You own market localization, from crafting tailored copy to ensuring high-quality ideas, captions, and visuals that resonate - and manage vibrant community communications, partnering with CX for best-in-class engagement and crisis response.

Your Role Accountabilities


Launching the HBO Max streaming service in Germany and all relevant social handles.
Leading local campaigns on German Original Productions ensuring creative & innovative campaigns from first brainstorm to final report on high-tentpole level in collaboration with the local German team, briefing internal creative teams and agencies when relevant.
You work with the social Performance team for optimal performance, relevant reporting, audience analysis, and collaboration w/relevant partners.
You drive engagement and awareness through a mix of creative, innovative ideas & formats, and tried-and-tested best practices, and work to elevate German productions across EMEA where relevant.
As the local lead in Germany, you own the local strategy for content creators (campaign based + always-on), cover local events on social and initiate impactful collaborations with local talent.


As part of the Brand & Content Social Streaming team, your areas of responsibility also include:


Managing and owning your local Social Media handles strategy
Creating, planning, managing, executing, and evaluating pan-European organic social media campaigns focused on engagement, retention, non-standard activations, and community building.
Leading social media campaign development for global originals, Sport and other key brand initiatives.
Creating tailored, out-of-the-box content in collaboration with our in-house design team.
Working creatively with the content of the service to build awareness, drive engagement, and conversation on social media.
Owning the daily interaction with our fans, working with the CX team, ensuring they’re informed, engaged, and following our tone-of-voice.
Monitoring and reporting on local audience sentiments and trends.
Staying on top of social media creative trends and ensuring top level social media marketing campaigns locally and on a pan-European level.


Skills And Experience Required


+3 years’ experience in social media/marketing brand and/or content
Flexible mindset, ready to adapt to a fast-paced, changing environment.
Great understanding for and experience working with fan communities.
Great knowledge and understanding of our brand and content - and its values.
Skills in project and budget management.
A self-sufficient and proactive approach to their work.
Strong skills in creative ideation & copywriting.
Strong campaign management skills and experience in campaign planning.
Fluency in written and spoken German & English. Great communication skills and relationship management.
A genuine, enthusiastic, and passionate fan of pop culture and new trends with knowledge and excitement for our content and product.


How We Get Things Done…

This last bit is probably the most important! Here at WBD, our guiding principles are the core values by which we operate and are central to how we get things done. You can find them at www.wbd.com/guiding-principles/ along with some insights from the team on what they mean and how they show up in their day to day. We hope they resonate with you and look forward to discussing them during your interview.

Championing Inclusion at WBD

Warner Bros. Discovery embraces the opportunity to build a workforce that reflects a wide array of perspectives, backgrounds and experiences. Being an equal opportunity employer means that we take seriously our responsibility to consider qualified candidates on the basis of merit, regardless of sex, gender identity, ethnicity, age, sexual orientation, religion or belief, marital status, pregnancy, parenthood, disability or any other category protected by law. Severely disabled employees are welcome in our company and will be given special consideration if they are equally qualified. Flexible working hours are offered to assist.

If you’re a qualified candidate with a disability and you require adjustments or accommodations during the job application and/or recruitment process, please visit our accessibility page for instructions to submit your request.

title: Social Media Manager:in (m/w/d)
description:
Wir suchen am Standort München oder Berlin eine:n Social Media Manager:in (w/m/d) befristet auf 18 Monate zur Unterstützung unseres Editorial-Teams.

Wir sind eine globale, socially-led creative Agency mit über 1.300 Mitarbeitenden in 19 Büros auf der ganzen Welt. Wir bieten unseren Kund:innen eine globale Perspektive in einer Zeit, in der die sozialen Medien die Kultur prägen.

Wir sorgen für Ideen, über die es sich zu reden lohnt. Wir verstehen soziale Verhaltensweisen innerhalb von Online-Communities, Kulturen und Subkulturen, die sich über die gesamte soziale Landschaft erstrecken. Zu den Auftraggebern in Deutschland zählen unter anderen AUDI AG, Mercedes Benz Trucks und Ravensburger. We Are Social ist Teil der Plus Company.

Wir suchen dich, um Social Media-Inhalte strategisch und redaktionell mitzugestalten. Der Großteil deiner Tätigkeit dreht sich um diesen spannenden Kund:innen, ergänzt durch projektbezogene Aufgaben für weitere unserer Kund:innen aus unterschiedlichen Branchen. Als Social Media Manager:in bespielst du ein breites Spektrum verschiedener Social Media Plattformen mit kreativem Content, der Fans begeistert.

Requirements

Was beinhaltet die Rolle?


Redaktionelle Recherche und Planung für Markenauftritte in Social Media
Contenterstellung und Publishing für ein breites Spektrum an Social Media Plattformen
Entwicklung von Social Media-Strategien
Verfassen von Reports und Auswertungen, u. a. Erarbeitung von Handlungsempfehlungen und Trendanalysen
Unterstützung bei der Entwicklung und Konzeption von Kampagnen mit und für unsere Kund:innen
Projektmanagement und Begleitung von Kampagnen
Live-Coverage in Social Media im Rahmen von Live-Events
Community Management auf den verschiedenen Social Media Plattformen


Wonach suchen wir?


Du brennst für Social Themen und Storytelling ist kein Fremdwort für dich
Versiertheit in Bezug auf alle gängigen Social Media Plattformen und Kanäle
Du stehst auf gute Texte, denkst kreativ, bist dir über die Macht der Worte bewusst und hast ein sehr gutes Gespür für Sprache und deren Stilmittel. Kurzum: Du weißt, wie du mit Communities smart interagierst
2-4 Jahre redaktionelle Social Media Erfahrung und/oder Berufserfahrung im Agentur Kontext mit redaktionellem Fokus
Sehr gute Kenntnisse in MS Office
Sehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift


Benefits

Warum du Teil unseres Teams werden solltest?

Lebendiger Teamgeist: Wir tragen das Adjektiv social sehr bewusst im Namen und leben einen starken Teamgeist und eine offene Unternehmenskultur mit flachen Hierarchien, in denen deine Stimme zählt!

Spannende Projekte mit internationaler Reichweite: Wir arbeiten an digitalen Projekten, die Maßstäbe setzen! Unsere Kund:innen kommen aus dem B2C- und B2B-Umfeld und sind sowohl lokale als auch internationale Player.

Global verbunden und lokal verwurzelt: Unsere Teams an den Standorten München und Kreuzberg profitieren von einem nachhaltigen Wissensaustausch mit den WAS Standorten weltweit und sind im Glockenbachviertel und Kreuzberg zu Hause.

Flexibilität - Yes please!: Hybrides Arbeiten vereint für uns die Vorteile des Home Offices mit denen des Arbeitens im Büro. Genau deswegen haben wir uns für einen 2/3 Split entschieden, der bedeutet, dass wir bei 40h mindestens 2 Tage vor Ort mit unseren Kolleg:innen und 3 Tage im Home Office arbeiten. But that's not all! Darüber hinaus sind wir große Fans von Remote Arbeit. Deswegen hast du bei uns die Möglichkeit 20 Tage innerhalb Deutschlands und weitere 20 Tage innerhalb Europas remote zu arbeiten. Wenn du also kein großer Fan des Deutschen Winters bist, join us und du kannst diese Zeit in Portugal oder Griechenland genießen.

Mehr Benefits für dich: Weil wir wissen, wie wichtig Well-being ist und wir Benefits einfach lieben, bieten wir dir mehr als nur den Standard. Genieße 2 zusätzliche Health Days, Menstrual Leave, einen freien Tag an deinem Geburtstag, eine Kooperation mit Urban Sports Club, das Deutschlandticket, eine Mitgliedschaft bei OpenUp und vieles mehr.
Show more

title: Marketing Manager - Germany
description:
The Pepperstone story started in 2010. We know what it's like to trade the world's markets. Our team describes us as a place for the curious and the driven, and we like to do things a little differently; as a transformative global fintech, we're digital, nimble, connected, and united in our vision to create a better way to trade.

We thrive on progress - for our clients and for ourselves. Our organisational culture is ever-evolving, vibrant, diverse, global, and results-focused.

You'll find our 550+ team currently across 11 locations and 9 time zones.

We are a global operating company, hence, we kindly request that you share your CV in English!

The Role

The Marketing Manager will play a crucial role in driving the business's strategic goals by focusing on lead generation, customer acquisition, retention efforts, digital initiatives, brand enhancement, and elevating the customer experience. On a daily basis, you will leverage various aspects of marketing, including creating impactful advertising campaigns, managing our website, conducting data analysis, engaging on social media, implementing search marketing strategies, coordinating events, and crafting compelling content.

As our Marketing Manager, your key responsibilities will include:

Lead the research, planning, and execution of data-driven marketing strategies and campaigns tailored specifically to the German market, with a focus on local brand positioning, lead generation, customer acquisition, and retention
Supporting the Senior Marketing Manager and other stakeholders by creating, scheduling and organising regionally relevant campaigns and calendars, ensuring all campaigns are delivered on time and on budget
Create campaign briefs and working with the EEA Marketing Executive, Design and Content teams to help deliver to the briefs; ensuring all messaging and creative assets are culturally relevant, linguistically accurate, and aligned with local customer behaviours and regulatory expectations
Strengthen Pepperstone's brand presence in Germany by increasing awareness, improving digital visibility, boosting customer engagement and driving local site traffic
Plan and manage local advertising efforts, utilising German media outlets and platforms. Optimise marketing investment using digital metrics and performance data
Continuously assessing and reporting on the results of campaigns and implementing improvements where necessary, working closely with Marketing Science to do so
Collaborate closely with internal teams such as Sales, Product, Research, SEO, and UX, to ensure a consistent and culturally attuned customer experience across all touchpoints within the German market
Build and maintain strong partnerships with local content publishers and regional advertising agencies to amplify brand reach and effectiveness
Work with technology and data science teams to create personalised, timely and relevant customer outbound communication strategies
Ensure that all marketing activities and materials targeting the German audience meet local regulatory standards and compliance requirements
Organise and execute local events, seminars, and sponsorship activations in Germany to enhance brand visibility, engage with key audiences, and support customer acquisition and retention efforts
Managing and working in close collaboration with our German Sales Teams in Dusseldorf



About you

Proficiency in written and spoken German and English

The Pepperstone story started in 2010. We know what it's like to trade the world's markets. Our team describes us as a place for the curious and the driven, and we like to do things a little differently; as a transformative global fintech, we're digital, nimble, connected, and united in our vision to create a better way to trade.

We thrive on progress - for our clients and for ourselves. Our organisational culture is ever-evolving, vibrant, diverse, global, and results-focused.

You'll find our 550+ team currently across 11 locations and 9 time zones.

We are a global operating company, hence, we kindly request that you share your CV in English!

The Role

The Marketing Manager will play a crucial role in driving the business's strategic goals by focusing on lead generation, customer acquisition, retention efforts, digital initiatives, brand enhancement, and elevating the customer experience. On a daily basis, you will leverage various aspects of marketing, including creating impactful advertising campaigns, managing our website, conducting data analysis, engaging on social media, implementing search marketing strategies, coordinating events, and crafting compelling content.

As our Marketing Manager, your key responsibilities will include:

  • Lead the research, planning, and execution of data-driven marketing strategies and campaigns tailored specifically to the German market, with a focus on local brand positioning, lead generation, customer acquisition, and retention
  • Supporting the Senior Marketing Manager and other stakeholders by creating, scheduling and organising regionally relevant campaigns and calendars, ensuring all campaigns are delivered on time and on budget
  • Create campaign briefs and working with the EEA Marketing Executive, Design and Content teams to help deliver to the briefs; ensuring all messaging and creative assets are culturally relevant, linguistically accurate, and aligned with local customer behaviours and regulatory expectations
  • Strengthen Pepperstone's brand presence in Germany by increasing awareness, improving digital visibility, boosting customer engagement and driving local site traffic
  • Plan and manage local advertising efforts, utilising German media outlets and platforms. Optimise marketing investment using digital metrics and performance data
  • Continuously assessing and reporting on the results of campaigns and implementing improvements where necessary, working closely with Marketing Science to do so
  • Collaborate closely with internal teams such as Sales, Product, Research, SEO, and UX, to ensure a consistent and culturally attuned customer experience across all touchpoints within the German market
  • Build and maintain strong partnerships with local content publishers and regional advertising agencies to amplify brand reach and effectiveness
  • Work with technology and data science teams to create personalised, timely and relevant customer outbound communication strategies
  • Ensure that all marketing activities and materials targeting the German audience meet local regulatory standards and compliance requirements
  • Organise and execute local events, seminars, and sponsorship activations in Germany to enhance brand visibility, engage with key audiences, and support customer acquisition and retention efforts
  • Managing and working in close collaboration with our German Sales Teams in Dusseldorf

About you

  • Proficiency in written and spoken German and English
  • Relevant experience in managing campaigns and projects
  • Experience with creating, producing, and trafficking marketing campaigns such as promotional activity, print production, website updates
  • Experience working with Content Management Systems (CMS), Salesforce and/or Marketing Cloud or similar marketing automation software
  • Track record of operating independently, demonstrating creativity, and delivering results in an organised manner
  • Strong time management skills with the ability to respond to and manage changing deadlines
  • Exceptional verbal and written communication skills and the ability to communicate to varying audiences and stakeholders
  • Excellent attention to detail

  • E-mail or mobile marketing experience
  • Experience in CFD and Forex industries
  • Experience in a fast-moving digital B2C company

title: Senior ATL Marketing Manager (f/m/x)
description:
Company Description

Are you a visionary marketer ready to drive transformative impact across leading automotive brands? Join Auto1 Group’s dynamic in-house marketing team as a Senior Media Manager and play a pivotal role in shaping the strategic direction for both Autohero and Wirkaufendeinauto.de as we expand our footprint across Europe.

As our Senior Media Manager, you will spearhead high-impact brand campaigns across TV, Streaming, OOH, Radio, and digital platforms like YouTube. You will leverage your strategic acumen and analytical prowess to craft data-driven strategies that attract high-quality customers and elevate brand awareness for our consumer-facing products.

Job Description


Lead the planning, execution, and optimization of performance-driven campaigns for Autohero and Wirkaufendeinauto.de across TV, OOH, Radio, and digital channels, including Streaming platforms and YouTube.
Develop and implement cutting-edge measurement and attribution frameworks to maximize the effectiveness of both offline and online marketing initiatives.
Conduct in-depth analysis of campaign performance by integrating KPIs with core business data, identifying strategic growth opportunities using advanced analytics tools.
Oversee strategic budget management and allocation across channels to ensure efficient customer acquisition and sustainable brand growth.
Build and present compelling, data-backed business cases for brand initiatives, while cultivating strong relationships with media partners and stakeholders.
Lead negotiations for TV pricing and manage high-level relationships with agencies to ensure optimal value and successful campaign delivery.
Collaborate with creative and production teams, utilizing data-driven insights to inspire innovative and impactful campaign concepts.
Identify, evaluate, and scale new offline and online channels to drive continuous growth and competitive advantage for both brands.


Qualifications


5+ years of experience in managing and scaling complex online and offline marketing campaigns, with a proven track record of delivering exceptional results in a dynamic environment.
Exceptional analytical skills and a strategic, data-driven approach, with proficiency in Excel and experience with SQL or BigQuery as a strong advantage.
Demonstrated leadership abilities with a keen attention to detail and a structured mindset for managing multiple high-stakes projects and campaigns.
Extensive experience in managing agency and media supplier relationships at a senior level.
Outstanding communication and presentation skills; fluency in English is essential.
Expertise in programmatic media buying and shaping creative strategy and direction is highly desirable.
Fluency in an additional European language—especially German, Spanish, Swedish, or Portuguese—is a significant asset.
High motivation, adaptability, and a commitment to challenging the status quo and driving innovation.


Additional Information


Once a unicorn, now a listed public company, be part of our success story!
Your work-life balance and working from home are part of our culture, so we offer you working-from-home options, flexible working hours, and 30 days of vacation
We invest in your personal and professional growth with a dedicated education budget for online courses, conferences and training
More than 90 different nationalities make up a truly international and diverse working environment
We offer discounts on well-known brands like Flaconi, Bosch, Apple, and Sky, as well as special offers on used cars for you, your family, and your friends
Stay Mindful! We believe that mental well-being is crucial for your personal and professional success. Release tension with free access to Headspace!


Join us, in building the best way to buy and sell cars!

Apply by uploading your CV in English with a note of your earliest starting date and your salary expectations.

Contact

Cezary Sliszka

At AUTO1 Group we live an open culture, believe in direct communication, and value diversity. We welcome every applicant; regardless of gender, ethnic origin, religion, age, sexual identity, disability, or any other non-merit factor.

title: Global Marketing Communication Manager
description:
At Jaeger Medical, we are redefining respiratory diagnostics. Our solutions set new standards in accuracy and ease of use, with the goal of making a meaningful difference for clinicians and patients worldwide. Join a team that is shaping the future of respiratory diagnostics with cutting-edge technology and a passion for excellence.




We are a team of over 400 dedicated employees worldwide. Jaeger Medical has been developing, manufacturing, distributing and supporting state-of-the-art technologies in the field of pulmonary function diagnostics, cardiopulmonary exercise testing and spirometry for over 70 years. Our established brands Vyntus™, SentrySuite™ and MicroGard™ are at the heart of our innovations in diagnostic devices, software and consumables.




Our customer-centric culture is shaped by our daily interactions with healthcare providers and their patients around the world. We value our diversity, openness and collaboration. We value the respectful treatment of the facilities and environment we enjoy and place sustainability at the heart of our future developments. Together with our enthusiastic and talented employees, we are committed to sustainable growth to ensure that Jaeger Medical remains a leading and successful healthcare company for the next 70 years and beyond.




We are seeking a dynamic and strategic Marketing Communications Manager to drive the global marketing efforts for Jaeger Medical, ensuring strong brand positioning, effective messaging, and seamless collaboration across international teams to support business growth and product innovation.




Your Key Responsibilities:




Marketing Campaigns & Brand Awareness

Execute high-impact marketing campaigns to boost brand recognition and sales.
Collaborate closely with international and US downstream marketing teams and managers to ensure effective strategy implementation.
Develop communication strategies aligned with corporate branding and business goals.
Utilize data-driven insights to optimize campaign performance and ROI.
Ensure messaging and content development reflect our brand positioning and value propositions.

Digital & Social Media Management

Maintain and update Jaeger Medical’s global websites and social media channels.
Implement digital marketing strategies to increase audience engagement and online visibility.
Coordinate with external agencies and internal teams to produce high-quality digital content.
Prepare for future eCommerce, customer, and partner portal developments by monitoring our online presence.

Market Intelligence & Competitive Strategy

Analyze industry trends, market insights, and competitive positioning to refine marketing plans.
Conduct market research and gather customer feedback to inform strategic decisions.
Develop clear positioning strategies that differentiate Jaeger Medical’s products in the marketplace.

Brand Leadership & Guidelines

Act as the brand ambassador, ensuring a consistent and compelling brand presence across all channels.
Define, develop, and maintain brand guidelines, templates, and standardized assets.
Collaborate with design and content teams to ensure all marketing materials align with our brand identity.
Oversee internal processes to ensure compliance with corporate marketing standards.

New Product Introduction (NPI) Execution

Develop marketing materials, sales tools, and product positioning frameworks for new launches.
Organize product photo shoots, release events, and promotional activities.
Coordinate seamlessly across departments to ensure successful product rollouts.




Your Qualifications:




Education and Experience:

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field.
At least 5 years of experience in global marketing communications, preferably within the healthcare or medical devices industry.
Proven track record in developing and executing integrated marketing campaigns.
Fluency in spoken and written English is essential; proficiency in German is an advantage.




Specialized Skills and Knowledge:

Highly motivated, strategic, and results-oriented professional with a strong background in marketing communications, capable of influencing stakeholders at all organizational levels.
Experience in healthcare or medical marketing, with the ability to craft impactful messaging tailored to diverse audiences.
Excellent collaboration, relationship-building, communication, and presentation skills.
Passionate about driving continuous improvement and innovation to enhance patient outcomes while achieving business objectives.
Ability to work effectively under pressure, managing multiple priorities and tight deadlines.
Strong business acumen with the ability to develop strategic plans and lead cross-functional teams in their execution.
Demonstrated success in exceeding expectations through strategic thinking and hands-on implementation.
High level of professional integrity, creativity, and analytical skills, with a problem-solving mindset.
Solid understanding of financial metrics and how marketing decisions impact business performance.
Experience with New Product Introductions (NPI) and brand positioning strategies.
Strong capability to evaluate marketing initiatives’ effectiveness and optimize strategies for maximum impact.




If you meet these qualifications and are eager to contribute to a leading medical device company, we look forward to your application to deinjob@jaegerrdx.com!




Contact:

Jaeger Medical GmbH

Leibnizstraße 7

97204 Höchberg




Please visit our website under: www.jaegerrdx.com

title: Marketing Operations Manager (B2B)
description:
1GLOBAL is a technology-driven global mobile communications provider dedicated to empowering enterprises worldwide to unlock the full growth potential of mobile connectivity. With a best-in-class telecom technology platform, a comprehensive suite of globally viable regulatory licenses, and privileged access to the telecom wholesale market, 1GLOBAL is uniquely positioned to deliver seamless compliance and connectivity solutions. Serving the world's leading banks, corporations, and digital-first businesses—including neo-banks, travel companies, and payment service providers—1GLOBAL connects over 43 million devices globally.

 

With 2024 full-year revenue exceeding US$100 million, 1GLOBAL is a profitable business generating significant cash flows to fund its ongoing investments in infrastructure, transformation, and growth. 2024 saw major client wins and marked 1GLOBAL's evolution from a multi-market telecommunication provider to a global technology-driven mobile connectivity powerhouse. 

 

Established in 2022 by experienced tech founders and entrepreneurs Hakan Koç and Pyrros Koussios, 1GLOBAL is a European technology leader driving digital transformation in the global telecommunications market. It operates as a fully regulated Mobile Virtual Network Operator ("MVNO") in nine countries and as a regulated telecommunications operator in an additional 31 countries. Headquartered in the Netherlands, with world-class R&D hubs in Lisbon, Berlin, and São Paulo, 1GLOBAL employs over 450 experts across 13 countries.


Position Overview

We are looking for an experienced and highly organised Marketing Operations Manager (B2B) to join our growing marketing team. This role focuses on managing and executing marketing operations for our enterprise segment — including events, website and CMS operations, project coordination, and campaign delivery.

You'll work closely with the Marketing Team and cross-functional stakeholders to help scale our marketing initiatives globally, ensuring high-quality and timely execution of strategic campaigns and activities.

Key Responsibilities

Project & Process Management: Coordinate and track timelines, deliverables, and stakeholders for B2B marketing initiatives
Website & CMS Management: Own operational updates to the website (via CMS), coordinate with tech/design for larger releases, and maintain publishing accuracy
Event Operations & Execution: Lead planning, setup, coordination, and post-event processes for B2B trade shows, conferences, and webinars
Marketing Ops & Execution: Support the operational delivery of multi-channel campaigns (e.g., email, content, partnerships, assets)
Cross-functional Collaboration: Work closely with Product Marketing, Sales, Tech, and external vendors to align timelines and execution plans
Content & Asset Management: Maintain structured documentation and storage of assets, decks, collateral, and localisation materials
Internal Coordination: Ensure smooth alignment across teams by owning meeting follow-ups, progress tracking, and documentation of key marketing processes



Requirements



Must Have

Bachelor's degree in Management, Operations or a related field. 
3-4 years of experience in B2B marketing operations, website & project management and campaign coordination with operational excellence
Experience with CMS tools (e.g., WordPress, Webflow, or headless CMS frameworks)
Strong project management skills with an eye for detail and deadline discipline
Experience in managing operations and execution for events or field marketing
Excellent communication and stakeholder coordination abilities
Comfortable working in a fast-paced, international, and cross-functional environment
Basic understanding of SEO
Fluent English (written and verbal); German a plus



Nice to Have

Familiarity with marketing collaboration tools (e.g.  Jira, Confluence, Figma, Trello)
Experience in telecom, enterprise or regulated sectors (e.g. tech, telco, fintech)
Master's or advanced degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field
Ability to automate repeatable processes and improve operational workflows



Benefits



Why 1GLOBAL?

Growth Opportunities: Advance your career in one of the fastest growing telecommunications companies, expanding over 40% year-on-year under the leadership of successful tech entrepreneurs
Major Transaction Exposure: Be in the driver's seat for transactions that will have an impact on the future telco industry
Work with a Talented Team: From the Board and the Founders to the Senior Management Team, you will collaborate daily with the most capable and renowned external advisors, and constantly being exposed to talented and driven individuals
Dynamic Work Environment: Thrive in a collaborative, fast-paced workplace where innovation is encouraged, and every contribution counts
Professional Development: Work alongside industry experts to enhance your skills and knowledge in a cutting-edge field
International Experience: Gain opportunities to work in different 1GLOBAL offices around the world as you grow within the company
Open Communication Culture: Join a team where your ideas are heard, and open dialogue is encouraged, fostering a supportive and transparent work environment
Get Things Done Attitude: Be part of a results-driven team that values efficiency, creativity, and the drive to make a tangible impact in the industry


1GLOBAL is an equal opportunity employer, we value your character as much as your talent. Diversity drives our innovation, and we offer a collaborative, dynamic, and international work environment. We are excited for you to join our mission to revolutionise connectivity globally.

Show more

  • International Experience: Gain opportunities to work in different 1GLOBAL offices around the world as you grow within the company
  • Open Communication Culture: Join a team where your ideas are heard, and open dialogue is encouraged, fostering a supportive and transparent work environment
  • Get Things Done Attitude: Be part of a results-driven team that values efficiency, creativity, and the drive to make a tangible impact in the industry


1GLOBAL is an equal opportunity employer, we value your character as much as your talent. Diversity drives our innovation, and we offer a collaborative, dynamic, and international work environment. We are excited for you to join our mission to revolutionise connectivity globally.

title: MARKETING MANAGER (m/f/d)
description:
At Betaseed, our mission is to make sugar beet cultivation easier and more productive for farmers and the broader industry. We focus on continuous innovation, offering high-performing varieties and creative solutions that support farmers throughout the entire growing process. With our headquarters in Frankfurt and teams across Europe and Asia, we’re committed to driving progress in farming. Join us in shaping the future! Discover more at betaseed.com.




We are currently looking for a MARKETING MANAGER (m/f/d) PERMANENT & FULL-TIME POSITION AT OUR HQ IN FRANKFURT/MAIN




YOUR IMPACT:

Be responsible for developing and executing impactful marketing strategies that strengthen our brand, engage our audiences and expand our market presence. Your key responsibilities include:




Creating targeted communication materials and content.
Setting SMART goals and tracking performance with KPI`s.
Managing and enhancing our website and social media presence.
Collaborating closely with sales, product management, and international teams.




SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE YOU’LL NEED:

Degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
Several years of professional experience in marketing, ideally in the agricultural sector.
Creative mindset with strategic thinking and a strong understanding of target audiences.
Proficiency in digital tools (CMS, social media, analytics, etc.).
Excellent communication skills in German and English is a must.
Team player with initiative and strong organizational skills.




PERKS AND BENEFITS:

Enjoy a self-directed, adaptable work setup.
Be part of a dynamic, international team with a start-up vibe.
Access personal development and competitive compensation.
Enjoy the option to work in a hybrid capacity.
30 days of vacations & extra hours tracked and usable as additional time off.




Connect with all BTS colleagues at our annual global seminar in a new country each year.

Ready to make an impact? We look forward to receiving your complete application (CV and motivation letter) to opportunity@betaseed.com




BetaseedGmbH●Friedrich-Ebert-Anlage36●60325Frankfurt/Main●www.betaseed.pl

BETASEED. SIMPLYDIFFERENT.

title: Brand Manager (m/w/d)
description:
Unbefristet (Vollzeit) am Standort Osnabrück

Du suchst nach einem Unternehmen, das Dir die Möglichkeit gibt, Dich auf vielseitige Weise einzubringen? Wir bieten Dir die Vorzüge eines internationalen Konzerns und die Dynamik eines jungen Unternehmens. Wir engagieren uns mit Leidenschaft für Menschen, Qualität und Leistung. Übernimm mit uns Verantwortung und werde ein Teil der FRONERI Erfolgsgeschichte!

FRONERI gehört zu den weltweit führenden Unternehmen für Speiseeis. In mehr als 20 Ländern engagieren sich mehr als 12.000 Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter für höchste Produktqualität und Kundenzufriedenheit.

Das erwartet Dich


Verantwortung für die nationale Marken-, Produkt- und Sortimentsstrategie
Projektverantwortung für Produktneueinführungen und Innovationsthemen sowie internationale Zusammenarbeit innerhalb des globalen Froneri-Teams
Produktmanagement und Sortimentspflege
Entwicklung und Umsetzung des Marketingplans sowie Erstellung von Businessplänen in Abstimmung mit dem Category Management und Vertriebs
Entwicklung und Umsetzung von Promotions und BTL Aktivitäten zur Markenaktivierung in enger Abstimmung mit den Vertrieben Retail und OOH
Entwicklung von kanal- und medienspezifischer Kampagnenassets in Zusammenarbeit mit Kreativ- und Mediaagenturen sowie Steuerung des Marketingbudgets
Durchführung von Markt-/Wettbewerbs- und Sortimentsanalysen sowie Marktforschungsprojekten


Das bringst Du mit


Du hast ein abgeschlossenes Studium mit Schwerpunkt Marketing/Sales und verfügst über eine mindestens dreijährige, fundierte Berufserfahrung im Marketing in einer vergleichbaren Position im Brand Management im FMCG-Bereich, idealerweise Food/Beverage
Du hast bereits mehrjährige Erfahrung in der Entwicklung von ATL/BTL-Kampagnen gepaart mit einer guten Kenntnis des deutschen Mediamarktes und einer hohen Social-Media Affinität
Du bist kreativ, organisations- und umsetzungsstark und arbeitest eigenverantwortlich und teambezogen
Du zeichnest Dich durch sicheres Auftreten, Kommunikationsstärke, Team- und Durchsetzungsfähigkeit aus
Sehr gute Englisch- und PC-Kenntnisse sowie Erfahrung mit Nielsen und GfK-Paneldaten runden Dein Profil ab


Darauf kannst Du Dich freuen


30 Tage Urlaub zzgl. 24. & 31.12. sowie flexible Arbeitszeiten
Kooperation mit Fitnessstudios, eine Betriebskantine, Corporate Benefits & Business-Bike-Leasing
Förderung berufsbegleitender Ausbildungen und Studiengänge
Eine angenehme & kollegiale Arbeitsatmosphäre in einem internationalen Arbeitsumfeld
So viel Eis wie Du essen kannst – am Arbeitsplatz und für Zuhause!


Bei Fragen darfst Du Dich gerne an Sophie (0541 9999-160) wenden.

title: Head of Partner Marketing Central Europe + UK/IE
description:
At Too Good To Go, we dream of a planet with no food waste. Our marketplace connects millions of users with thousands of food businesses across 19 countries, making sure surplus food doesn’t go to waste. We are proudly a certified B Corp and one of Europe’s most loved and mission-driven consumer brands.

Your Mission

As Head of Partner Marketing Manager you will be part of our international, multidisciplinary Marketing community, with a focus on the Cluster Center markets (DACH, PLCZ and UK/IE). You will play an integral role in our mission to reduce food waste by driving shared partner marketing activity with our most impactful partners that engages and motivates consumers to download and use the Too Good To Go app. You will collaborate closely with the Key Accounts team, to build and strengthen relationships with our partners’ internal marketing teams, getting buy-in for co-branded campaigns and activations.

Your Role

Reporting to the Director of Marketing Cluster Center, you will be responsible for consumer facing and internal shared marketing campaigns with our biggest and most prominent Key Account partners, such as Aldi, Spar, Migros, Coop, Biedronka, Zabka, Greggs and as well as driving acquisition of new partners through B2B initiatives.

Responsibilities Include


Create and own the strategy and delivery of partner marketing in Cluster Center to scale activations, drive demand, secure new business, and enhance execution within existing accounts.
Lead, coach and develop the team of Partner Marketing across Cluster Center markets in providing guidance to markets in setting business objectives, implementing marketing strategies, and developing business plans with ongoing support.
Be responsible for and deliver innovative and impactful shared B2B2C partner marketing campaigns that positively impact consumer demand KPIs, including New Paying Users and Meals Saved (i.e. purchases)
Define & measure success of all Partner Marketing programs and ensure ROI thresholds for financial performance are met.
Oversee the planning and execution of a Too Good To Go Partner Advocacy event, which will engage relevant stakeholders from Partner Organizations with the commercial goals of Too Good To Go’s key accounts and retail technology teams.
Manage the development and implementation of Too Good To Go’s partner-focused presence at major industry events and conferences.
Manage the partner marketing budget in an effective manner
Develop and strengthen relationships with key stakeholders within the marketing teams of our Key Account partners in Cluster Center
Collaborate closely with our Heads of Key Accounts and their team to identify opportunities and prioritise activity that ensure short and long term growth
Collaborate with the Heads of B2C, PR, public affairs and global partner marketing colleagues as well as creative teams (matrix organisation) to maximise campaigns and events, brief activity and align on channels and messaging on our own and our partners channels
Feed the international learning loop to help continuously optimise strategies, messaging and activation towards and together with partners, share best-in-class examples to drive success with global accounts, outperform competitors, and identify challenges and growth opportunities.
Adapt global tools to unlock local opportunities and challenge markets to elevate overall global performance


Requirements


Fantastic proven track record delivering successful integrated Partner Marketing campaigns that hit KPIs (B2B2C and B2B) at international scale
Experience in online marketplaces and tech is a must
Fluent in English and/or German plus another Cluster Center language. Strong interpersonal, presentation and communications skills, with a track record pitching to and negotiating with internal and external teams where you’ve inspired and influenced a range of senior stakeholders
Experience leading and developing an international team of colleagues to drive excellence
Experience with performance data from Partner Marketing campaigns and using the insights to drive next steps
Strong planning and analytical skills
Strategic thinker who enjoys being hands on - happy to roll up your sleeves to deliver business impact both in the short and long term
Proven to establish new business partnerships, a self starter with the ability to operate effectively and collaboratively in a fast paced, ever-changing, international matrix organisation
Exceptional organisational and multitasking skills, being able to prioritise effectively and work across a large number of partners in different markets
Experience in leading key projects (project management)
Keen eye for detail, and proficiency in briefing & reviewing campaign assets.
A true passion for sustainability - you understand the urgency of action for the planet


Our Values


We Win Together; We Raise the Bar; We Keep It Simple; We Build A Legacy; We Care.


What We Offer


A rare opportunity to work in a global social impact company and certified B Corporation, where you can see real and tangible impact in your role.
Work alongside an international community of users, partners and 1,400+ colleagues across 19 countries on the same important sustainability mission.
Personal and professional development in a fast-paced scale-up environment.
An inclusive company culture where you can bring your authentic self to work.
A strong, values-driven team culture where we celebrate success and socialise with colleagues that care.


Benefits


Work Flexibly
Enjoy hybrid working from our great offices, at home or abroad.
Extra parental leave and days off beyond local legislation and the option to take an extra week of unpaid leave
Health insurance and pension plans (subject to country of employment).
Additional days off for significant life events
Celebrate and Socialise
Regular social events like summer and winter parties.
Coffee, snacks and fully-equipped kitchens.
Get to know our community with a monthly free Surprise Bag.
Paid volunteer time through our Shareback volunteering programme
Women in the Workplace, P.R.I.D.E., People of Colour and Functionally Diverse Employee Resource Groups

How To Apply


We take recruitment very seriously, so please carefully read everything we have written above. Please also check our website and international media in order to get a good overview of Too Good To Go.
Submit your CV and Cover letter in English.
Please note that we only accept applications coming through our platform. No CV or Cover Letter will be accepted by email or LinkedIn direct messaging.


A Movement for Everyone

We want to inspire and empower everyone to fight food waste together. With that mission, it’s only natural that we want to build a diverse and inclusive team of highly capable individuals who are passionate about doing things in a better way. We strongly believe we all excel and are more creative when we’re allowed to be ourselves, and we’re committed to a culture where all of us belong.

We are an equal opportunity employer and all employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need. If you need reasonable accommodation at any point in the application or interview process, please let us know.
